SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Ad
The Ad class represents an advertisement with various properties such as owner, title, description, pictures, price, region, category, and publication date.
AdService
The AdService class provides methods to manage advertisements.
AdsRepository
The AdsRepository class provides methods to read ads from a JSON file and assign them to random users.
Application
 
DataInitializer
The DataInitializer class provides methods to initialize user and ad data from JSON files.
InvalidAdInformations
The InvalidAdInformations class is an exception that is thrown when an advertisement contains invalid information.
InvalidUserInformations
The InvalidUserInformations class is an exception that is thrown when a user contains invalid information.
User
The User class represents a user with various properties such as id, first name, last name, username, mail, phone, age, and region.
UserService
The UserService class provides methods to manage users.
UsersRepository
The UsersRepository class provides methods to read users from a JSON file.
